title: To amend the Child Care and Development Block Grant Act of 1990 to require criminal background checks of child care providers.
content: Child Care Criminal Background Check Act of 2009 - Amends the Child Care and Development Block Grant Act of 1990 to require child care providers that are licensed by a state or receive funds under the Child Care and Development Block Grant Program to: (1) obtain a comprehensive criminal background check of each employee who provides child care services, each applicant for employment, and each family child care provider who provides or applies to provide such services. And (2) refuse to employ individuals convicted of crimes of violence or crimes against children. Reduces by 10 allotments to states that fail to comply with the requirements of this Act.
